definition[0]: a room where television and radio programmes are made and broadcast or where music is recorded
definition[1]: a film company or the buildings it owns and uses to make its films
example[2]: Depardieu is making a film with one of the big Hollywood studios.
definition[2]: a room where a painter or photographer regularly works
definition[3]: a room where dancing lessons are given or that dancers use to practise in
definition[4]: a small apartment with one main room
